text:
~MyE$&ntaH SaqrA aSI$ryantaq tE SaqrA a#Bavaqn tacCaqrANA(gm)# SaraqtvaM ~MvajrOq vai SaqrAH kShut Kaluq vai ma#nuqShya#syaq BrAtRu#vyOq yacCa#raqmayIq mEKa#lAq Bava#tiq vajrE#Naiqva sAqkShAt kShudhaqM BrAtRu#vyaM maddhyaqtO&pa# hatE triqvRud-Ba#vati triqvRudvai prAqNastriqvRuta#mEqva prAqNaM ma#ddhyaqtO yaja#mAnE 
dadhAti pRuqthvI Ba#vatiq rajjU#nAqM ~MvyAvRu#tyaiq mEKa#layAq yaja#mAnaM dIkShayatiq yOktrE#Naq patnI$M mithunaqtvAya# - [  ] 21
